pages.text: Make your snowballs more deadly by putting a piece of metal into them. Now you can actually use them as weapons and kill your enemies.
The Iron Cored Snowball inflicts one heart of damage.
The Gold Cored Snowball does half a heart of damage but has the effects of Looting I when killing someone.
The Diamond Cored Snowball inflicts 1.5 hearts of damage and applies Slowness I for a short time.
The Netherite Cored Snowball does two hearts of damage and applies Blindness for a short time.
The explosive snowball causes a little explosion on impact. It's the perfect throwable to knock back your enemies.
